content: elfin lace socks knit up quickly to create a lovely summer sock pretty in ankle length or longer pattern is toe up and written for magic loop but is easily adaptable to dpns yarn 4ply / fingering sock yarn needles 2 75mm long circular needles or needles required to get gauge i prefer finer tipped needles to make the lace knitting easier gauge 34 sts 44 row per 4 inch in stockinette size the pattern is written for a uk size 6 5 eu 40 us 9 the length can be easily adapted and width can be changed by adding or removing stitches in multiples of 16 size can also be altered by changing gauge
